participant_1.background:

I am not close to my family because of what happened when I was a child.
everyday after work i buy my dog a dog biscuit.
I enjoy water skiing but feel like I need to find another creative outlet to express myself.
I've got a pretty big collection of old music records that I like to show my kids.

i have woman calling me all the time.

i worry about my image.
I love to curl up with a good book and lose myself in another world.

content.text: What's your favorite way to relax?
I love to curl up with a good book and lose myself in another world.
That sounds really nice. What types of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of things, but I'm especially interested in history and science.
That's cool. I like to read history too.
It's really interesting to learn about how the world has changed over time.
Yeah, it's amazing to think about how different things were just a few hundred years ago.
I know, right? I'm also really interested in learning about different cultures.
Me too. I think it's really important to be open-minded and learn about different ways of life.
I agree. I think it's the only way to really understand the world.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a software engineer.
Oh, cool. I've always been interested in computer science.
It's a lot of fun. I get to work on a lot of different projects.
That sounds really interesting.
It is. I'm really lucky to have such a fun job.
It sounds like you enjoy it.
I really do. It's the perfect job for me.
That's awesome. I'm glad you're happy with your job.
Thanks. I am
